name: Beer (itch)
description:
Made for the Weekly Hour Game Jam #whgj - theme: privacy and security

Taking into account the rules state you should only spend 1 hour on the game and because I wasted a fair bit of time, what we have is quite simple:

Drink the beer.

Game does follow the theme, albeit loosely, thanks to the inclusion of a 'security guard'. The privacy part? Well, the location is secluded.
